lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because:
Loving God by serving people
Mathew 25:35 For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink......

lenders.name: Happy Hollow School
lenders.loan_because: The children of the Happy Hollow School Preschool and Kindergarten classes are excited about learning about the world we all share.  By making loans to real people, working hard and making a difference in these far off places, the students of Happy Hollow School feel like they are part of this distant community and that this small loan can bring us all closer together.  In turn, the students learn how ingenuity, hard work and a helpful friend and community can make a big difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: The students at Happy Hollow School work hard and have fun learning about new ideas, new culture and even more about everything that they can do.  Most of all the students learn that they can do anything they set out to do - as the people that the Happy Hollow School makes loans to prove every day.

lenders.name: Scott and Jessica
lenders.loan_because: God is good, and his love directs our path.
lenders.occupational_info: Scott makes computer programs that work on the Internet.  Jessica takes care of our 2 year old sonn and has a photography business, she is awesome at it.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It makes so much sense and I get to know a little about the loan recipients and lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the upkeep of the space in a large San Francisco law firm with 300 employees and oversee some support services including mail, copy, fax, supply purchasing, reception, catering. I am also studying holistic nutrition at Bauman College.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: something so small to me can make such a big difference to someone else.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: These people work hard (usually much harder than people in the West, and in much worse conditions) and deserve some help to improve the quality of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Social Entrepreneurship

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the micro loan system
lenders.occupational_info: I work in post secondary distance education

lenders.name: Bank of Geoff
lenders.loan_because: It's a cool way to make a difference--helping others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I program for various sites for the Web.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: i just wanna help people.
lenders.occupational_info: i sell fedex services. i help people ship things around the world.

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.loan_because: I thought it was about time to put my money where my mouth was......
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university level history courses.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: Investing in an individual with a small business helps them financially, but also helps build independence and self respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach bankers how to prepare a quarterly report that bank regulators use to monitor the financial condition of each bank.  I present 1-2 day and internet seminars  for banking associations throughout the United States.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because: I think well placed money can make huge changes in people's lives, and those who have it possess a greater responsibility to help those who don't.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is gift you give yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I practice medicine using natural remedies such as herbs, vitamins, and homeopathics.  I love what I do.

lenders.name: Bruce and Mike
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: retired

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: sometimes all people need is a chance and it can propel them to new heights.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses to better connect with their customers through Internet video applications.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: "People don't understand that not only can they make a difference; it's their responsibility to do so." - Florence Robinson

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in a micro way.
lenders.occupational_info: Researcher/writer for a U.S. corporation and mom of three kids.

lenders.name: ayep
lenders.loan_because: need to buy dragon fruit seeds
lenders.occupational_info:
hi,......
i am a dragon fruit farmer, i mean i have a small agriculture. dragon fruit is a special fruit. very special because in my country the fruit just needed in chinesse new year.
i need the money to get a new variety of dragon fruit seeds.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: someone believed in my business dream and gave me the opportunity  to start my own company...this is my chance to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies elevate their brands

lenders.name: Al
lenders.loan_because: I think living in a country full of weath I need to help and support the entrepreneurs of the future.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: It's leaving a good mark.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand their pets.  And I help pets live peacefully with their human family.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be born in a wealthy country. I feel it's my responsibility to help out.
lenders.occupational_info: Lobbying state government to support legislation beneficial to insurance agents.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.occupational_info: I work with group that builds hydraulic systems that are used all over the world

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lenders.name: Cherissa
lenders.occupation: Small Business Owner : Ice Cream Shop
lenders.loan_because: helping someone for opportunity to succeed, is a priceless thing to invest in.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to lend a helping hand. We should all strive to make connections with as many peoples and places in the world as we can. I believe this is the path to peace.

lenders.name: Bjorn
lenders.loan_because: Helping other people around the world brings rewards to everyone involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the international shipping business.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Our family believes that providing these loans allows everyone an opportunity to improve the world. We really feel fortunate to be able to provide these loans for people and families that truly deserve it.

lenders.name: Ron and Marlene
lenders.loan_because:
"Called from worship into service
Forth in your great name we go,
To the child, the youth, the aged,
Love in living deeds to show.
Hope and health, goodwill and comfort,
Counsel, aid, and peace we give,
That your children, Lord, in freedom,
May your mercy know, and live".
Hymn text by Albert Bayly,
The Liturgy of the Hours
lenders.occupational_info: Retired manufacturing engineer responsible for electrical feedthroughs in implantable heart pacemakers; retired Early Childhood Special Education teacher

lenders.name: Rae
lenders.loan_because: I used to be a single parent struggling to make ends meet. Now I'm in a position where I can afford to help others. This is one small way I can pay back the people who helped me when I needed it.

lenders.name: Qin
lenders.loan_because: everyone that can should
lenders.occupational_info: housewife

lenders.name: Gale
lenders.loan_because: In March of 2007 I visited India on business. I came home with a new awareness of how fortunate I am. Microfinancing is a wonderful way to help people build better lives for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and manage teams of people who build systems people use to save money for their retirement

lenders.name: natalie
lenders.loan_because: We all need help once in awhile.

lenders.name: The Barzin Family
lenders.loan_because: It's incredibly painless for modern Western people and it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I help prepare new information for doctors and put it on the internet.

lenders.name: Cristy
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that I am lucky and blessed to live in
such a wonderful place and have so many opportunities. I believe that it is important to give to others...to give freely without hesitation or expectation!
lenders.occupational_info: Massage Therapist

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I know it works.  I lived in Botswana for 2 years and I witnessed what enterprising women could do with just a little bit of money.
lenders.occupational_info: I use computers to help people find the information they need to get their jobs done quickly and easily.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I support microfinance

lenders.name: Raquela
lenders.loan_because: because i want to make a diffrence in this wourld by helping people who don't have the ability to help themselves

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want help others reach their dreams, as I work towards mine.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a highschool student. I work at a local Japanese Bistro.

lenders.name: Asmo Halinen
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org is a great way to help!

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to be helped by people in my life and I want to give something back.

lenders.name: CHUN-CHIEH
lenders.loan_because: I hope there is a wonderful world.

lenders.name: Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: I hope that people will come to understand each other better, and that I will learn more about the world. Also, I intend to put the Ki into Kiva. You may reach me at jimmysv@gmail.com
lenders.occupational_info: Government employee working with the production of drinking water.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I think it's worth doing. You never know when the littlest thing you do is going to have a major impact on someone. I recently started sponsoring a child through children-inc, but wanted to do more and this looked like a great opportunity to assist others and create a chain reaction of events that will benefit many in the process.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently buying a small business that deals in "new age" services and items. Additionally I act as a ghost writer and motivational speaker.

lenders.name: René
lenders.loan_because:
For me Kiva.org is an opportunity to help the less fortunate people. 
And a loan is the (I think) best way to do so.
Kiva.org makes it easy and very approachable and in the end it doesn't cost you a cent.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I care about your lives and I would love to see you increase and expand in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Fulfilling

lenders.name: Hamish
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate and I am grateful for that.

lenders.name: Remarkable Innovation
lenders.occupational_info: Remarkable Innovation provides research and technical advisory services to those developing, or investing in, innovative technologies.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is one of the best ways ever created to help people succeed.

lenders.name: Karina
lenders.loan_because: This is such an easy and direct way to give back to the countries I'm fortunate enough to visit.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for an environmental software company.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: Money has to be accessible to people with a project.

lenders.name: Adam & Christine
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are lucky enough to be able to loan.

lenders.name: T L
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in whatever way I can.

lenders.name: Kyla
lenders.loan_because: I collect money instead of birthday gifts and then loan it to other people through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in grade four.  I love school!

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed through hard work.

lenders.name: Soren
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: In a spirit free from economical calculations and political power games, find the inspiration, the vision and the strength to meet life in a creative sustaining way

lenders.name: Tonia
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the best way to alleviate poverty is to help people help themselves. There are a lot of hard-working, talented people around the world who simply haven't had the opportunities that I've had. This is how I hope to return some of the abundance that I enjoy.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for a regional government in the Netherlands. I advise on economic matters, ranging from (corporate) finance for start ups to how to improve the education level of our work force. 

In addition, I'm the founder & chair of Mineke Foundation, working in Liberia to continue the development work my Liberian father and Dutch mother started so many years ago.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Try to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Coordinate the activities of workers on a common project.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's a hand-UP, not a hand-out.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an internet site.  We capture the 'clicks' that people make on our site.  I tabulate the clicks so that we can tell our advertisers what is most interesting to our visitors.  That's how we can ensure the site is free to visitors and that we are always expanding the areas that are most interesting to the visitors.

lenders.name: Famille Santerre-Crête
lenders.loan_because: Every bit helps

lenders.name: Merilyn
lenders.loan_because: Someone once helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I have an old church which I have restored as a special events venue.  I primarily serve as a location for weddings and receptions in southwest Louisiana

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hope to people in developing countries and help them and their families to have a better, more fulfilling quality of life.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help other people!  I wish I had more to give!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a middle school (6-8 grade) helping students with special needs.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.occupational_info: Help managers improve their business operations

lenders.name: Ayovi
lenders.loan_because: We are blessed and I want to make a positive change in the world. No matter how small it may seem, it truly makes a big difference in the lives we help. It's my way of Loving my Brothers & Sisters all over the Globe.
lenders.occupational_info:
I founded Virtuous Vision Enterprises making a positive impact  through Networking, Volunteering and Lending. 

We have been able to help inner city teens to travel internationally through our teen missions program.

lenders.name: tina Hill
lenders.loan_because: It often takes only a little kindness to change someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer operator and write murder mysteries

lenders.name: Maria/Elisabet
lenders.loan_because: we want to make a change

lenders.name: Michael & Sara
lenders.loan_because: we believe in making the world a better place.

lenders.name: Bryna
lenders.loan_because: It is an effective and simple way to make a big difference in other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with activists to help individuals who are unjustly imprisoned or who are at risk of human rights abuses.

lenders.name: Elwin
lenders.loan_because: I can help
lenders.occupational_info: I sell components for trucks and trailers.

lenders.name: worldly babes
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help women all over the world to be successful
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of women that teach, run a business, manage money and supervise therapists at an occupational therapy clinic

lenders.name: Vinson Family
lenders.loan_because: Our family believes in the concept of paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: WSBR provides a long-term home to boys who are in need of a stable environment.

lenders.name: Bernie
lenders.loan_because: seemed like a nice thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: Urban public high school - Chicago

lenders.name: Ashwin
lenders.loan_because: Its good for them and even better for me.

lenders.name: Leeann
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the individual stories behind the load requests, and by the belief that I am making both a sound investment and a real difference to someone I've never met.

lenders.name: Grethe
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of running a home for children and youth.

lenders.name: Burt and Lois
lenders.loan_because:
We like to help others...and learn about people and
places in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Nathanael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference.

lenders.name: Hilde Bygdevoll
lenders.occupation: Regulatory Affairs Manager, A/S Norske Shell
lenders.loan_because: I joined KIVA after reading about it in Bill Clinton's new book "Giving". I love the concept of helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I love traveling and meeting new people, see new things and learn about the world.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I have visited Africa, Zambia, and have been in the compounds.  I know how hard it is for people to run a small business and feed their family.  Many people are looking after grandchildren or working without a partner due to AID/HIV. I admire those who are trying to make a go of their businesses and are not simply looking for Santa Clause to donate and drop money on them with no incentives.  That type of donation I feel demeans receivers and givers.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Ireland with a worldwide Catholic religious organisation dedicated to the education of young people.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help others who have the desire and determination to find creative ways to support themselves and their families, but might not have the capital or financial means to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching music; directing choirs.  I now teach private voice lessons to help supplement my pension and stay financially stable since my husband died last year.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.loan_because: I loan because Christ told us to be charitable and to be good stewards of our money.  What I have is better spent on these folks than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just a college student that fits in a few hours of work here and there.

lenders.name: Mahendra
lenders.loan_because: To give a helping hand to the hardworking individuals with good vision to advance to the next phase in their business.

lenders.name: Shoni-Cody
lenders.loan_because:
from the first time I heard about KIVA I wanted to give to this organisation, because I believe that most people just need a little bit of help to be able to stand on their own two feet, and support themselfs and create a better life for their family. - I like to give a chance.-
So, my kids and I held a big bake sale to benefit KIVA.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: As I have worked hard and made my dreams come true I want to give others the chance to strive to achieve their own dreams for themselves and others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design the electrical systems for office buildings.  I work with architects and construction companies to create buildings that people can work in and be comfortable and productive.  I help design light systems and providing power connections for all the equipment in buildings; heat, lights, computers etc.

lenders.name: caileigh
lenders.loan_because: I have no reason not to!

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life.  I want to give to others the help that they need to become self-sufficient, just like my family and others did for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach music to 10 to 18 year-olds at an International School in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: We belong to each other- Mother Teresa
lenders.occupational_info: I'm Blessed

lenders.name: carol
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to, and I want women-owned businesses to have a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a college geology department, caring for materials, assisting the professors, and setting up lab experiences to teach students about our Earth.

lenders.name: Anchorage Rotaract
lenders.loan_because: One of Rotaract's main areas of service is International Service.  We wanted to get into this field and Kiva seemed like the perfect path.  We are very impressed with the work that Kiva does and we plan to stay with them for a long time.
lenders.occupational_info: Rotaract is a Rotary-sponsored service club for young men and women ages 18 to 30. The Anchorage Rotaract Club is sponsored by Anchorage East Rotary and Anchorage Downtown Rotary.  If you want to serve your community, enhance your leadership skills; build relationships within the community, all while promoting international understanding and peace through a framework of friendship and service, then Rotaract is the place for you!

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: To help give hard working people a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a personal training gym in Stamford, CT.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.occupational_info: Aesthetics is a career dedicated to helping others to look and feel better. I am a specialist who offers preventive skin care and give treatments to keep skin healthy and attractive.

lenders.name: EcoQuo
lenders.loan_because: EcoQuo seeks to help the developing world become green.

lenders.name: erika
lenders.loan_because: its a way to take a little money and make a big impact to someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: I research and document artifacts relating to Australia's history.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Community Work

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I am lucky to have money, so that I can send it to others that can also benefit from it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a professional consultant to people and companies within the agriculture and biofuels sectors.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.occupation: Retired teacher & former small business owner
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Neena
lenders.loan_because: My father always believed in helping people (esp. women) get a chance at a better life. I donate in his memory.
lenders.occupational_info: I am able to share my love of books and reading with others.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help people accomplish their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I write TV & film scripts.

lenders.name: Boni Maroni
lenders.loan_because:
The first time I saw a piece on PBS about KIVA I got a smile on my face.  It just seemed to damn good, but yet I still smiled.  I didn't give for quite some time because I was still kinda leery. Leeriness  subsided. I started to lend and it felt good to do my small little part.  
Got in a bit of trouble with the good ol' IRS but I'm back on the site.  Soon as I get a new job Ima sure throw some funds Kiva's way.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I have lived in Mexico and have seen how much a small loan can mean to someone who is trying to support their family and escape poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small hotel on the shore of beautiful Lake Superior.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: Those who are able are obligated.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of high school students (ages 14-18. I am passionate about reading and want to inspire my students to be involved and empathetic about the world around them.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: Women owning their own businesses is one of the best ways to fight poverty and help children.
lenders.occupational_info: By better understanding economics, people can make better choices.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It is the most empowering way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in the semiconductor industry.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: Money belongs to God and its for us to use to help each other :)
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell old interesting objects, like pottery, art and furniture.

lenders.name: Collette
lenders.loan_because: I was invited and wanted to give a helping hand towards dreams being realized.
lenders.occupational_info: While traveling in other countries, I write about the cultures and everything I experience.

lenders.name: Ironmonkey6
lenders.loan_because: To lend is something quickly forgotten if it is not asked. Kiva makes us aware that you can lend responsibly and to people who unlike people who usually lend spend their money on their independance. Isn't that what freedom is all about?
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently looking for a better job while attending school.

lenders.name: Jennifer
Monique
lenders.loan_because: I can and I care.

lenders.name: Antoine
lenders.loan_because: my parents think it's a good idea

lenders.name: dawn
lenders.loan_because: i can.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I realize that something so small to me, can mean the world to someone less fortunate. It's important to help others be happy and successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a senior in High School, and will soon be going to Carleton College in Northfield, MN.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people take care of their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to foreign students in Chicago.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is expected"

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: with Kiva because the gift of giving just keeps on repaying itself.  Each time you send in a loan and it bounces back PAID you play it forward again to someone or a group whose lives around the world are forever changed.  We can all make a difference and with Kiva the difference is the number of people you can positively impact over and over again.

lenders.name: William
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching the next generation of scientists, and learning through research how human cells are affected by the DNA damage arising from aging and environmental toxicants

lenders.name: Monica Samara
lenders.occupation: REVENDEDORA OF DE FRAGANCIA PERFUMES FAMOSOS OF CO
lenders.loan_because: I NEED 500 DOLARES, POWER TO GET A ESTOQUE OF PRODUCT FOR DELIVERY PRONTA BECAUSE THE RETURN OF INCOME AND GUARANTEED IN REAL 66%
lenders.occupational_info: SALE OF PRODUCTS OF DOOR DOOR IN EU AND WHERE MY FRIENDS ARE TAKING SUCESSOS IN SALES

lenders.name: CA Third Grade
lenders.loan_because: We wanted to help people around the world, and learn about different countries.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students in third grade, we are 8 and 9 years old.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I understand what it is like to work for yourself, it can be difficult but it is most rewarding. These people are more than willing to work hard to help themselves and their families, a quality I admire, and if I can help them to achieve their dreams then I am very happy to do so.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way of giving to people who are prepared to help themselves

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: Pay if forward
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise a crew of people that produce printed products from high speed printers and digital web presses.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I borrow
lenders.occupational_info: 40 yrs old, 1 child, single.

lenders.name: The Amlin Family
lenders.loan_because: Our daddy wants us to learn to help people and make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Our daddy is a principal at a public school.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I should and I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach employees in a big company.

lenders.name: Murphy & Karl
lenders.loan_because:
The value of just a few US dollars is multiplied by making it available to hardworking people who just need some credit to succeed.  

I love the huge return in human benefit on such a small investment of capital!
lenders.occupational_info: Finance and operations management

lenders.name: David and Susan
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to give back, and to somehow try to balance the injustice of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: David is an actor - he performs, teaches, directs, and clowns in childrens hospitals.  He is touring with his one-man show "7 (x 1) Samurai" this summer.  Susan is an interpreter for the Deaf - using American Sign Language to help those that can hear communicate with those who cannot.

lenders.name: Mark, Michelle & Jack
lenders.loan_because: its a chance to tell a brother or sister we will probably never meet how much we care about them. (Thanks Kiva.)
lenders.occupational_info: I help make sure medical devices that help paralyzed people breath work properly.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: Sharing and opportunity go hand in hand and with the world getting smaller we can embrace those whose lives can be included in the world of civilized society by giving more meaning to an otherwise struggling existence.  It is only by this can we consider ourselves rich.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to make a house more of a home by using novel and creative ideas to improve the look and comfort of the people who live there.   Many things are not always what make a beautiful home but the arrangement and colors that express the personalities of the families who reside within.  This ability can make even the most spartan of homes a treasure.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I care about the entrepreneurial spirit across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help create companies.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I've got some money to spare and it I'm glad to lend it to someone who will make some god use of it

lenders.name: Bodie
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people see their potential.

lenders.name: Markus
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it will make a difference in somebody's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school, then I do homework

lenders.name: Bianca
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I am blessed and that it is my responsibility to give back to the world whenever I can. It makes me feel happy inside to be able to help!

lenders.name: rusidi
lenders.loan_because: I wish to look for capital aid which without using warrant , help me
lenders.occupational_info: I  will be open, but conducting non having capital, I wan selling clothes of , yarn, cloth, hitherto look for which fund aid without warrant very difficult... request aid to [all] donor, if effort I can success, I will return, and hopefully I also can assist my brothers and sisters which still insufficiency.

lenders.name: Cicley
lenders.loan_because: i support the concept of mirco loans and hope to use Kiva as a way to effectively reach folks around the world

lenders.name: Shaan
lenders.loan_because: I hate poor people
lenders.occupational_info: I write stuff to sell stuff.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to help families around the world live comfortably one step at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I help provide services for children under three years old that have developmental delays. I connect their families to the services they need (such as physical therapy or speech therapy), and provide support and resources to their families.

lenders.name: Alissa
lenders.loan_because: probably for the same reason that flowers give their pollen to bee's and tree's give us oxygen.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help further someones dream and help them better their life

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Kayaktion-Dan
lenders.loan_because: I kayak around the world and never knew how I could help the people of these great places.  Now I know exactly how my small company, Kayaktion, can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a kayaking website that's linking paddlers with other paddlers and with outfitters in destinations around the world.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: People who work hard and earn a living are what drives everyone's prosperity and happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: Computers for a health care center.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I love everything about Kiva! It's so much fun to connect with small business people around the world and watch them turn their dreams into reality.

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: Gotta do more than just talk.
lenders.occupational_info: Slow.

lenders.name: shannon
lenders.loan_because: I am learning more and more about money, poverty, access, and cooperation, and I like the idea of micro finance and do it yourself business financing. I hope to continue to be inspired by people's stories, and create my own stories, while I strive to follow my own path.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a nurse and run a small creative business.

lenders.name: Carole
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and wants me to share with others.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity.  I like the idea of helping people who are working to fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies who are looking to make major changes to their business.

lenders.name: Chun Kiat, Lucas
lenders.loan_because: i would want to reach out to make a difference to someone else's family & loved ones
lenders.occupational_info: making a difference in someone's life in their Personal & Financial situation. Optimising & Re-discovering their current resources

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing to do.
I like people. I like people who help themselves.
Make hay while the sun shines.
lenders.occupational_info: I market my clients and their products to the masses.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Make all the computers work all the time, and it is a lot of computers.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: it is so easy to help in a meaningful way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a family doctor. I take care of the health of people of all ages.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference for the good of others... and I feel my life is more connected to neighbors near and far.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I learned to give, not because I have a lot...but because I know exactly, what it's like to have nothing.....
lenders.occupational_info: I ensure data keeps moving through the Internet exactly where it's suppose to go.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves and one another through the wonder of voluntary value-for-value exchange.
lenders.occupational_info: I write adventure fiction to excite, entertain, and uplift.

lenders.name: Jenni
lenders.loan_because: All my basic needs are met, and then some. I can't justify the time and money I spend on myself when I look at some of the poorest in the world and wonder, what would they tell me is necessary. I want to do good and make a better situation for someone that couldn't otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a hospital, taking care of people that have cancer and are very sick.

lenders.name: Venkateshwaralu
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference :)

lenders.name: Clive Girdham
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Clive Girdham is a Sydney based photographer who specializes in teaching photography.

lenders.name: tran
lenders.loan_because: I want to do something that can make big money and make my dream becomes true. I want to start a business in order to change my life.

lenders.name: Zac
lenders.loan_because: I think microcredit is a revolutionary tool to enable motivated people get themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Peer-to-peer finance & web technology

lenders.name: senthil
lenders.loan_because: to Develop my business and to over come from financial crisis
lenders.occupational_info: Our business is involved in the printing industry, banner printing in flux, vinayls and sign board My previous machine is been bought in seconds and it's making lot of trouble and i want to import a new one so I need funds as loan.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way to help grown and able people help themselves!

lenders.name: Marcel
lenders.loan_because: I like the kiva-project and their way of giving
lenders.occupational_info: I advise profit and non-profit organisations and individuals, concerning profit, income, estate, property taxes in the Netherlands and also international taxes. I prepare opinions on tax liability resulting from prospective and past transactions. I represent clients in tax litigation.

lenders.name: Suzanna
lenders.loan_because: Because we all need to open doors for people to have better lives.

lenders.name: Nuhu
lenders.loan_because: I want to expand my business which is the sale of class'C' drugs
lenders.occupational_info: My business is selling of medicines in a small area in my locality which includes paracetamol,brufen,tetracycline,malafan,teedar and others.

lenders.name: Ursula
lenders.loan_because: I love peoples stories and I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work designing improvements to bridges to keep our roadways safe.

lenders.name: Kristrún Tinna
lenders.loan_because: They say give a man a fish and he’ll eat for a day, give a man a fish pole an he’ll eat for a lifetime!

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help to improve the economic stadning of people around the world that aren't as lucky as we are to be born in this country. 

I also want to allow the rest of the world to see what a kind, generous and wonderful people  we are.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach partner dancing to people of all ages at Austin Uptown Dance.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I should. It's something I can do for those who need a boost from someone who has received several.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because:
1.    I want to help people who so desperately want to help themselves and their families.

2.    They are not looking for handouts, but merely a hand up.  

3.    We tend to take what we have for granted and even a modest loan of $25.00 is enough to start some entrepreneur on their way to financial independence.  

4.    What a great way to eradicate poverty.

5.    I firmly believe that to those whom much is given, much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate attorney.  I represent people who wish to buy or sell real estate in Massachusetts.

lenders.name: Abigail Fisher
lenders.loan_because: I believe.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a venture capital firm.  We invest in young technology companies just starting out.  Less than ten people work at my firm, so it's different every day.  We have a lot of fun.

lenders.name: Sabrina
lenders.loan_because: I am helping to assist and empower women globally to excel in business and in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women be successful leaders and entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Gene and Barbara
lenders.loan_because: They Need

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I study how and why people make mistakes when doing high risk activities

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: It's good to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I prosecute white collar criminals.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: microlending is an amazing way to reach out to folks who need a little help, and I'm happy to be in a position to offer help.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: I am excited and honored to be even a small part of the energy that can help an individual or group achieve success.
lenders.occupational_info: I match spaces with individuals, resulting in stronger financial and spiritual opportunities, creating a base for the journey.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: For my 50th birthday my girlfriend introduced me to Kiva as my gift.  It was a wonderful gift for me and for the folks who recieve help from this program.  Thanks Donya.

lenders.name: Alexander family
lenders.loan_because: like the concept of helping others with recyclable funds.  It appeals to my compassionate conservative sense of lending resources to those who simply want better and are willing to work at their own industry.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Los Angeles Deputy Sheriff (policeman).

lenders.name: Karyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world. I feel doing these loans  is a great way to do this. My husband and I have raised 2 children & taken in 4 homeless kids which is another way we have given back to society.
lenders.occupational_info: I  have my own business Camp Bow Wow training dogs which I have done for over 25 yrs. This is my passion in life. My breed of choice is the English Cocker Spaniel.  I recently opened an Ebay store selling dog supplies the store is called Spaniel Supplies.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: I want to loan because I want the world to be a better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I would describe my work like doing chores around the house.

lenders.name: Himansu
lenders.loan_because: Generally speaking, people tend to be poor because of the circumstances in which they are born and not because they are lazy or untalented (not their fault). Kiva makes it so easy for us to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software.

lenders.name: Tess
lenders.loan_because: I want to see change in the world. I believe in microfinance and believe that this supports economies and does not hurt them. I love people and want to see their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time college student studying International Community Development. I study alot!

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: It's such a simple, inexpensive way to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: St Thomas Church
lenders.loan_because: We understand that we have been blessed so that we can be a blessing to others
lenders.occupational_info: We are a community that tries to live as disciples of Jesus.

lenders.name: Nico Terpak
lenders.loan_because: I want to create a better world

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.

lenders.name: nuno
lenders.loan_because: WE ARE ONE

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Any small amount can help another person.  An amount that we consider lunch money has so much more meaning to so many others in the world. My small contribution will help and so will yours.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the  finance office of a major hospital in the United States.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great idea. I think we should be promoting and helping people who want to help themselves out! I am so supportive of people who want to reach their dreams and I believe in you all :)
lenders.occupational_info: I look after surface water (water that falls on the ground when it rains which runs off the ground) to help ensure that it is clean and reduces chances of flooding.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: I know that our pooled resources can add up and truly help those in need.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing, through an enterprise like Kiva, has the power to improve the lives of individuals, communities, countries, and ultimately the world.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help someone fulfill  their dreams of a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a schoolteacher for 19 year usually helping those students that may have a more difficult time in the regular classroom setting.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone help themselves and therefore their community
lenders.occupational_info: I work with women who went to a Catholic High School and encourge them to live out the mission of the school of life, leadership and service

lenders.name: Laureano
lenders.occupation: Grad. student, freelance writer and translator
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help KIVA promote micro-economic growth, financial freedom, and entrepreneurship throughout Latin America.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student and a freelance writer, interpreter, translator (Spanish, English, French)

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because:
I want to support farmers because it is a hard and challenging life that requires someone with great creativity and stamina. I know because I fight the weather and struggle to feed my poultry everyday!
Good Luck to Farmers! We need it!
lenders.occupational_info:
Poultry Farmer of rare breeds.
I show and sell birds and eggs

lenders.name: Roderick
lenders.loan_because: It empowers people

lenders.name: Marilee
lenders.loan_because: Kiva  is such a wonderful idea. To think we can help  others so directly and  with  no interest charged. A brilliant idea.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others in any way I can and this seems to be a very worthwhile endeavor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with 12 and 13 year olds, helping them improve their reading and writing.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because:
I not only lend to greatly impact the lives of the entrepreneurs I lend to, but also to impact my life and the lives of those around me.
    Understanding the economic and social problems in developing countries is most effective at a personal level. By connecting with people around the world and then sharing with our neighbors, we can help ourselves and each other see clearly and make progress towards fixing individual problems that are part of macroscopic issues..
     Merely giving resources does not seem to be the most effective way to improve the economic standing of individuals. However, I believe in empowerment: giving that individual the opportunity to improve her or his situation with the knowledge and support to step forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in a public high school, learning in order to attain higher education.

lenders.name: Noah
lenders.loan_because: Money is necessary to create positive business activity which will benefit the community. If you don't have any money and want to create that positive business activity someone has to lend it to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people in starting their own businesses for mutual financial benefit.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.occupational_info: I design equiptment for cell phone towers.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Because I have so much to be thankful for!

lenders.name: Kathleen Toronto Ontario
lenders.loan_because: it will help women become self sufficient and independent, which ultimately will empower their children.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: Pen to paper, fingers to keypad, feet to soil--I'm a writer and a traveler.

lenders.name: maxine
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help now & then, and if you can offer it & support someone, why the heck not?
lenders.occupational_info: I manage inventory of products and place orders for more product.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make someone else's life a little easier and to pass along the blessings I have been given.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe that most people want to succeed and just need a hand sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a chiropractor. I treat people with neck and back problems and keep them functioning at their optimal ability

lenders.name: Maria Joao
lenders.loan_because: it´s great to help somebody to be independent.

lenders.name: Jonek
lenders.loan_because: I got a $25 gift certificate from my friend Noah.  I've really enjoyed it, and I've given two gift certificates myself.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I think it is our duty to help others and if you have the means to help I think its your duty to!
lenders.occupational_info: Everyday I go to school, and hopefully after to that to collage, I am thinking about going into music therapy.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: Better someone else uses my money,  I'll just spend it on booze.
lenders.occupational_info: Graphic design, book production, non-profit business development in Africa

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: This is how my family can help in a small and significant way.
lenders.occupational_info: I help soothe peoples physical pain and help them heal themselves in body, mind & spirit.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: my family and I agree that this is the right thing to do for hard working people who need just a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people to play musical instruments.
